Hero.bookingDetails: Please find my booking details attached.

Discounts.headline: Enjoy our discounts!
Discounts.intro: Travel comfortably and economically with these special offers.

callToAction.title: Travel smart and save!
callToAction.description: Book your seats and enjoy substantial discounts on your next trip.

ServicesOverview.headline: Our Services
ServicesOverview.description: We offer reliable passenger transport services. Travel with comfort and confidence on every journey!

modernFleet.title: Modern fleet
modernFleet.description: Comfortable and well-maintained coaches with amenities for a pleasant journey.

extensiveRoutes.title: Extensive routes
extensiveRoutes.description: Regular connections between major European cities with convenient pick-up and drop-off points.

reliableSchedules.title: Guaranteed safety
reliableSchedules.description: We prioritize the safety of our passengers with experienced drivers and strict vehicle maintenance measures.

cta.title: Travel with Doga VitalTrans SRL today
cta.description: With Doga VitalTrans SRL, every trip is comfortable, reliable, and affordable. Let us take you safely to your destination!

BenefitsSection.headline: Why travel with us?
BenefitsSection.description: At Doga VitalTrans SRL, we don't just transport passengers – we provide a complete travel experience with comfort, reliability, and convenience.

modernFleet.title: Modern fleet
modernFleet.description: Comfortable and well-maintained coaches with air conditioning, WiFi, and generous luggage space for a pleasant journey.

competitivePricing.title: Competitive pricing
competitivePricing.description: Affordable rates with special discounts for students, children, and frequent travelers. Group booking discounts available.

multilingualStaff.title: Multilingual staff
multilingualStaff.description: Our staff speaks Romanian, English, and other European languages to assist all passengers with their needs.

reliableSchedules.title: Reliable schedules
reliableSchedules.description: Punctual departures and arrivals with real-time updates. We value your time and plan for an efficient trip.

easyBooking.title: Easy online booking
easyBooking.description: Simple booking system available 24/7, allowing you to book tickets from anywhere with instant confirmation.

gallery.title: Vital Trans Bus Gallery
gallery.footer: Discover our modern and comfortable fleet!

HowItWorksSection.headline: How it works
HowItWorksSection.description: Booking your trip with Vital-Trans is simple. Follow these four steps to ensure a comfortable travel experience.

choose.title: Step 1: Choose your trip
choose.description: Select the departure, destination, date, and number of passengers through our easy-to-use booking system.

book.title: Step 2: Book your ticket
book.description: Fill in personal details and payment information to secure your reservation instantly.

receive.title: Step 3: Receive confirmation
receive.description: Receive the e-ticket and trip details via email with pick-up location and departure time.

enjoy.title: Step 4: Enjoy your trip
enjoy.description: Arrive at the pick-up point, board our comfortable bus, and relax as we take you to your destination.

cta.title: Ready to travel through Romania?
cta.description: Join thousands of satisfied passengers who trust Vital-Trans for their travel needs. Book your trip today and experience comfortable travel!

Footer.companyDescription: Professional passenger transport services. Safe, comfortable, and reliable journeys for all travelers!

Contact.headline: Contact Vital-Trans
Contact.description: Have questions about our transport services? Ready to book your trip? Fill out the form and our team will get back to you within 24 hours.

form.title: Book your trip or send us a message
